title: Visual Perception Learning-Based Skin Cancer Diagnosis Competency Enhancement Course (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Classification Concepts of Skin Lesions and Foundational Skills in Medical Imaging Interpretation
context.additional_context: Blended education combining smartphone-based mobile learning and face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Learners can improve skin cancer diagnosis accuracy by over 25% in delayed assessments after two weeks.
Learners can apply a combined strategy of active and passive tasks to real-world work scenarios
Learners can accurately classify complex skin lesion images using a 3-tier system (benign/suspicious/malignant)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
